description:
It works on Ubuntu 21.10.

Thanks for this wrapper!

Great idea, and I really wish it worked, but it does not.
When trying it one gets an error message, that "it does not work on windows 7 or lower". 
I don't exactly know how the programm convinced the ReMarkable App, that my OS is a windows, while I use Fedora, there is somewhere a bug. 

I hope that this will be adressed, because if it could work, I would be immensely thankful.

Works through Wine. First i thougt the app was not working (again) but suddenly a Wine configuration app popsup.. and from there everything works great.. 

thank you a lot for this possibility
summary: be patient when Wine is still in the bottle

description: The app is always crashing on Ubuntu 22.04 :(
This "app" is really just a prepackaged Wine environment tweaked to run the Windows version of the app. It works great and I don't miss native Windows one bit.
summary: Works just like the Windows version

description:
Perfect porting through Wine, works seamlessly.
WARNING: in my case there was a little problem in the initial account-connection, in fact, when pressing "request code" to pair the desktop app with the rm account, it crashed. Instead, directly go from a browser to my.remarkable.com/#desktop while you are already logged in your rm account in the browser. It will show you the code to put in the desktop app, directly without the need to click on the button that makes the app crash when it tries to open the browser for you. Cheers!
summary: Works amazingly (read description on how to use)

description:
Doesn't do a thing on 22.04.

Installer shows, after that, nothing.

I install follow the steps, I even downloaded into the wine environment that it uses the updated version of the desktop 3.3 but I get a similar error.

Starting application..
05:31:13.683 [01;33mrm.network.usertoken   Invalid UserToken : ""[0;37m (userToken2Json C:/a/xocm
05:31:13.692 [02;32mrm.network.usertoken   Could not parse UserToken as Json object[0;37m (parsem
libGL error: No matching fbConfigs or visuals found
libGL error: failed to load driver: swrast
X Error: GLXBadContext
 Request Major code 152 (GLX)
 Request Minor code 6 ()
 Error Serial #381
 Current Serial #380
 
Looking around not sure if its because I have NVIDIA and is trying to use mesa libraries but ultimately I can't use it. Would love to get some suggestions.

summary: Amazing when it works. Currently stuck at the login

description: The Remarkable application has me do an update and specifies that the windows version must be 10 instead of the prepackaged default environment's 7
Its a Wine application that crashes after installation.

Funktioniert bei mir ganz unkompliziert auf Ubuntu 22.04.
Die App hat lediglich Probleme, einen one-time code abzurufen, dabei bleibt sie ewig hängen. Man erhält ihn aber auch, indem man https://my.remarkable.com/device/desktop/connect im Browser aufruft. Danach funktioniert das Ganze super. (Schwach ist nur der Remarkable-Support, der auch auf mehrmalige Rückfragen behauptet, dass es unmöglich sei, die App unter Wine zum Laufen zu kriegen.)
summary: Funktioniert (mit one-time code über den Browser)

description: La app no funciona. Se instala y reinstala constantemente. Ya la he desinstalado.
